mapper.insert: insert into project (id, project_code, project_name, project_type, schedule, create_time, creator, Modifier, update_time, delete_time, back_up1, back_up2, back_up3, back_up4, back_up5, back_up6, back_up7, back_up8, back_up9, back_up10,organization,project_money,project_stage,project_status,creator_name,application_end_time,project_end_time ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schedule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{backUp1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backUp2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backUp3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backUp4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backUp5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backUp6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backUp7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backUp8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backUp9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backUp10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{projectMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{projectStage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{projectStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicationEndTime},#{projectEndTime} )
mapper.sql: id, project_code, project_name, project_type, schedule, create_time, creator, Modifier, update_time, delete_time, back_up1, back_up2, back_up3, back_up4, back_up5, back_up6, back_up7, back_up8, back_up9, back_up10,organization,project_money,project_stage,project_status
mapper.select:
select count(*) from project a
and a.project_code like "%" #{projectCode} "%"
and a.project_name like "%" #{projectName} "%"
and a.create_time like "%" #{createTime} "%"
and a.project_type like "%" #{projectType} "%"
and a.project_manager like "%" #{projectManager} "%"
and a.leval like "%" #{leval} "%"
and a.status =#{status}

select a.* from project a
and a.project_code like "%" #{projectCode} "%"
and a.project_name like "%" #{projectName} "%"
and a.create_time like "%" #{createTime} "%"
and a.project_type like "%" #{projectType} "%"
and a.project_manager like "%" #{projectManager} "%"
and a.leval like "%" #{leval} "%"
and a.status =#{status}
order by create_time desc limit #{rownum},#{pagecount}

select count(*) from project a
project_status like "%3%"
and a.project_code like "%" #{projectCode} "%"
and a.project_name like "%" #{projectName} "%"
and a.application_end_time like "%" #{projectTime} "%"
and a.project_type like "%" #{projectType} "%"
and a.organization like "%" #{organization} "%"
and a.schedule like "%" #{schedule} "%"

select a.* from project a
project_status like "%3%"
and a.project_code like "%" #{projectCode} "%"
and a.project_name like "%" #{projectName} "%"
and a.application_end_time like "%" #{projectTime} "%"
and a.project_type like "%" #{projectType} "%"
and a.organization like "%" #{organization} "%"
and a.schedule like "%" #{schedule} "%"
limit #{rownum},#{pagecount}
select a.* ,b.schedule as AllSchedule,b.node from project a LEFT JOIN business_configuration b on a.project_type=b.project_type where a.id=#{id} and a.project_type=#{projectType}
select a.* ,b.schedule as AllSchedule,b.node from project a ,business_configuration b where a.id=#{id} and b.project_type=#{projectType}
select min(application_end_time) from project where project_status like CONCAT("%","3","%")
select count(*) from project where DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y')=#{niandu} and status=3
select DISTINCT year(application_end_time) from project where application_end_time!='' order by year(application_end_time) desc
select p.* from project p where id not in(select project_id from project_application where project_id is not null AND is_delete="0")
select * from project where DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y')=#{niandu} and status = 2
SELECT * FROM `project` where back_up1=#{userId} and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{createTime},'%') order by create_time desc

select a.* from project a
and a.project_code like "%" #{projectCode} "%"
and a.project_name like "%" #{projectName} "%"
and a.project_type like "%" #{projectType} "%"
and a.leval like "%" #{leval} "%"
and a.project_manager like "%" #{projectManager} "%"
and a.status =#{status}
and a.id =#{id}
and a.create_time like "%" #{createTime} "%"
